    • handleLOGIN

      public void handleLOGIN(String input) throws IOException
      Handle the "LOGIN" protocol from server. Check the username of client, if it is already exist on the server, asking a new username.
      Parameters:
      input - The input protocol receives from the server
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleLIST

      public void handleLIST(String input) throws IOException
      Handle "LIST" protocol from the server after client send the "LIST" request.
      Parameters:
      input - The input protocol contains the list of active users.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setupNEWGAME

      public void setupNEWGAME() throws IOException
      Asking the user whether they want to play as a human or as an AI and then joining the queue.
